title: Sage and Onion Stuffing
ingredients: 1 loaf white bread, cubed and dried
2 Tbsp fresh sage, chopped (or 2 tsp dried)
instructions: Melt butter in large skillet. Saut√© onions and celery until softened, about 10 minutes. Add sage, thyme, salt, and pepper. Combine with bread cubes in large bowl. Add enough broth to moisten. If you prefer a moister dressing, add a bit of broth. This is sufficient stuffing for a 10-12 lb turkey.
